alert.note: Alert for South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:18PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN CASS AND CENTRAL CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 418 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gull Lake, or 7 miles northwest of Brainerd, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Baxter around 430 PM CDT. Merrifield around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Brainerd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
